name: Cube Slide v1.2 Valentine's Day
description:
It's a very simple game where you slide past the obstacles. This is my first project and it was from a Brackeys tutorial. However I am updating it with new levels AND themed holiday levels. Currently there are 15 levels. WARNING - Simple does not mean easy and you may rage, a LOT.

CONTROLS - Left and Right arrows to move. You move forward automatically.

Planned updates - 

v1.2 Valentine's Day Update (Current Version - Out Now)

v1.3 St. Patrick's Day update (March)

v1.4 April Fool's and Easter update (April)

v1.5 Summer update (June)

v1.6 Fourth of July update (July)

v1.7 Autumn update (September)

v1.8 Halloween update (October)

v1.9 Thanksgiving update (November)

v1.10 Christmas update (December)

There may be other updates as well such as patches and extra levels.

I may be making an Infinite Cube Slide soon so watch out for  that.
